tool.name: ProteinInference
tool.description: Protein inference based on the number of identified peptides.
tool.command:
ProteinInference
#if $param_in: -in $param_in #end if #if $param_out: -out $param_out #end if #if $param_min_peptides_per_protein: -min_peptides_per_protein $param_min_peptides_per_protein #end if #if $param_treat_charge_variants_separately: -treat_charge_variants_separately #if " " in str($param_treat_charge_variants_separately): "$param_treat_charge_variants_separately" #else $param_treat_charge_variants_separately #end if #end if #if $param_treat_modification_variants_separately: -treat_modification_variants_separately #if " " in str($param_treat_modification_variants_separately): "$param_treat_modification_variants_separately" #else $param_treat_modification_variants_separately #end if #end if #if $adv_opts.adv_opts_selector=='advanced': #if $adv_opts.param_force: -force #if " " in str($adv_opts.param_force): "$adv_opts.param_force" #else $adv_opts.param_force #end if #end if #end if

param.name: param_min_peptides_per_protein
param.label: Minimal number of peptides needed for a protein identification

param.name: param_treat_charge_variants_separately
param.label: If this flag is set, different charge variants of the same peptide sequence count as inidividual evidences

param.name: param_treat_modification_variants_separately
param.label: If this flag is set, different modification variants of the same peptide sequence count as individual evidences

tool.help:
Protein inference based on the number of identified peptides.
For more information, visit http://ftp.mi.fu-berlin.de/OpenMS/release-documentation/html/TOPP_ProteinInference.html
